Tool

NameAdd Coordinates to points
ID6
AuthorVictor Olaya (c) 2004

Description

The module attaches the x- and y-coordinates of each point to the attribute table. For 3D shapefiles, also the z/m-coordinates are reported.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Points Shapes (input)INPUT
Output
Output (*)Shapes (optional output)OUTPUT
(*) optional
